mapper.insert: insert into manage_menu values(#{menu_idx}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_category}, #{menu_picture}, #{option1_YN}, #{option2_YN}, #{option3_YN}, 'Y', 'test', now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT menu_idx, menu_name, menu_price, menu_category FROM manage_menu WHERE active_YN = "Y"
mapper.update: UPDATE manage_menu set menu_name=#{menu_name}, menu_price=#{menu_price}, menu_category=#{menu_category}, menu_picture=#{menu_picture}, option1_YN=#{option1_YN}, option2_YN=#{option2_YN}, option3_YN=#{option3_YN}, mod_time=now() WHERE menu_idx = #{menu_idx}
UPDATE manage_menu set active_YN="N" WHERE menu_idx = #{menu_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT order_idx, order_no, str_to_date(order_no, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS order_date, user_no, menu_idx, menu_name, count(*) as total_cnt, count(order_no) AS cnt, menu_price, sum(option_price) AS option_price FROM order_number WHERE left(order_no,8) >= replace(#{start_date},'-','') AND left(order_no,8) <= replace(#{end_date},'-','') AND (active_YN = "P" OR active_YN = "Y") GROUP BY order_no ORDER BY order_date DESC

SELECT a.order_no, STR_TO_DATE(a.order_no, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS order_date, a.total_price, COUNT(a.order_no) AS cnt FROM payment a LEFT JOIN order_number b ON a.order_no = b.order_no WHERE LEFT(a.order_no,8) = REPLACE(#{this_day},'-','') AND b.active_YN = "P" AND a.pay_status = "P" GROUP BY a.order_no ORDER BY a.order_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(c.order_no) AS cnt, IFNULL(CAST(SUM(c.total_price) as unsigned),0) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT a.order_no, STR_TO_DATE(a.order_no, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS order_date, a.total_price, COUNT(a.order_no) AS cnt FROM payment a LEFT JOIN order_number b ON a.order_no = b.order_no WHERE LEFT(a.order_no,8) = REPLACE(#{this_day},'-','') AND b.active_YN = "P" AND a.pay_status = "P" GROUP BY a.order_no ORDER BY a.order_date DESC ) c

SELECT a.order_no, STR_TO_DATE(a.order_no, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS order_date, COUNT(DISTINCT a.order_no) as total_cnt, COUNT(a.order_no) AS cnt, sum(b.option_price) as total_price, a.coupon_YN FROM payment a LEFT JOIN order_number b ON a.order_no = b.order_no WHERE LEFT(a.order_no,8) >= replace(#{start_date},'-','') AND LEFT(a.order_no,8) <= replace(#{end_date},'-','') AND b.active_YN = "P" AND a.pay_status = "P" GROUP BY LEFT(a.order_no, 8) ORDER BY order_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(c.order_no) AS cnt, SUM(c.total_price) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT a.order_no, STR_TO_DATE(a.order_no, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS order_date, COUNT(DISTINCT a.order_no) as total_cnt, COUNT(a.order_no) AS cnt, a.total_price FROM payment a LEFT JOIN order_number b ON a.order_no = b.order_no WHERE LEFT(a.order_no,8) >= replace(#{start_date},'-','') AND LEFT(a.order_no,8) <= replace(#{end_date},'-','') AND b.active_YN = "P" AND a.pay_status = "P" GROUP BY LEFT(a.order_no, 8) ORDER BY order_date DESC ) c

SELECT *, IFNULL(sum(b.cnt), 0) AS cp_cnt, IFNULL(b.order_num, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')) AS order_no FROM payment AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(coupon_YN) AS cnt, STR_TO_DATE(LEFT(order_no, 8),'%Y%m%d') AS order_num, order_no as order_no_string FROM payment WHERE LEFT(order_no,8) >= replace(#{start_date},'-','') AND LEFT(order_no,8) <= replace(#{end_date},'-','') AND pay_status = 'P' AND coupon_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY LEFT(order_no_string, 8) ) as b ON a.order_no = b.order_no_string GROUP BY LEFT(a.order_no, 8) ORDER BY a.order_no DESC
